item.title: [IRL] Planning and organization for next SRE meetup
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I hope you are all doing well.

Following the discussions on our Telegram channel we wanted to start sharing ideas and topics in order to prepare the agenda the next SRE meetup.

item.title: [Online] Planning and organization for next SRE meetup
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I hope you are all doing well.

Following the discussions on our Telegram channel we wanted to start sharing ideas and topics in order to prepare the agenda the next SRE meetup.
